alert.note: Alert for Maricopa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 22 at 5:54PM MST until December 22 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... * Until 645 PM MST. * At 553 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sundad to 16 miles northwest of Gila Bend to 11 miles west of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field to 15 miles north of Ajo, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Buckeye, Gila Bend, Palo Verde, Painted Rock Dam, Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, Bosque, Cotton Center, Sonoran National Monument, Palo Verde Nuclear Generation Station, Wintersburg, Hassayampa, and Arlington. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 112 and 114. AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 98 and 135. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 1 and 17. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
